title: AMD Catalyst Application Profiles V12.2
description:
AMD Catalyst Application Profiles V12.2  [2/29/2012]

Description:
This release of AMD CatalystÃ¢â€žÂ¢ delivers support for the latest AMD CrossFireXÃ¢â€žÂ¢ profiles. A separate executable file ensures users have access to the latest set of profiles installed on their PC.
                                       
New profiles added to this release:
-  Mass Effect 3:  Improves CrossFire performance
-  Path of Exile Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Improves CrossFire performance
-  Darkness 2 Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Resolves flickering issues on single GPU configurations when Anti-Aliasing is forced on in the Catalyst Control Center
-  Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Resolves character texture corruption seen using single GPU configurations when Anti-Aliasing is forced on in the Catalyst Control Center
